episodes.title: From Cult Survivor to Podcast Queen: Azar Gets Real on Paul Pierce, Love, & Truth After Dark
episodes.description:
Welcome to SAFE TO SAY the podcast where we dive into the dynamic world of juggling business, motherhood, fitness, and everything in between. Join us as we explore the inspiring stories, practical tips, and insightful conversations of strong women  & men who are mastering the art of balancing it all.

Subscribe to our Channel: https://youtube.com/@heathersanders_?si=kWV5PxRyUQ_9Csxv

Shop now:
